      • setRawLeftStick

        public void setRawLeftStick​(XYPair xy)
        Needed for a few scenarios where we want to emulate the underlying joystick behavior and not the intent after inversion.
        Parameters:
        xy - XYPair to directly set. (Remember that by default, most joysticks have an inverted Y axis!)

      • setRawRightStick

        public void setRawRightStick​(XYPair xy)
        Needed for a few scenarios where we want to emulate the underlying joystick behavior and not the intent after inversion.
        Parameters:
        xy - XYPair to directly set. (Remember that by default, most joysticks have an inverted Y axis!)
